name: Dear sonâ€¦
description: In 2019, I launched the project myFATHERintheCloud.ai. The project is dedicated to my father Siegfried Gross who worked in sculpture for 60 years. In the project my father becomes artistically immortal, his work is continued through machine learning models. This letter was written by a machine learning model trained on the words of Siegfried Gross, two years after his death. #Datasculptor
